com.agorapulse.gru

Class GruContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.gru.GruContext

  • public class GruContext
extends Object
    Gru context holds result of the controller's method call and any exception thrown during setup or action execution.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static GruContext EMPTY
      Empty context instance.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public static GruContext from(Callable<?> code)
        Creates new context from callable, storing the result as result and any exception thrown as error.
        Parameters:
        code - code returning the result and throwing any exception which will be assigned to error property
        Returns:
        new context from callable, storing the result as result and any exception thrown as error

      • error

        public static GruContext error(Throwable error)
        Creates new context with just error.
        Parameters:
        error - error of newly created context
        Returns:
        new context with just error

        Creates new context with just result.
        Parameters:
        result - result of newly created context
        Returns:
        new context with just result

      • resultAndError

        public static GruContext resultAndError(Object result,
                                        Throwable error)
        Creates new context holding given result and error.
        Parameters:
        result - result of newly created context
        error - error of newly created context
        Returns:
        new context holding given result and error

      • cleanError

        public <T extends Throwable> GruContext cleanError(Class<T> type)
